definition: to pay no attention to outside matters
pinyin: liang3 er3 bu4 wen2 chuang1 wai4 shi4

definition: Foreign Affairs Office (at a university)/Foreign Affairs Department

sentences.english: He graduated from Xi'an international university , the Department of Foreign Languages English majors.
sentences.chinese: 毕业于西安外事学院，外语系英语专业。

sentences.english: It was rather high-handed to punish the child for the accident.
sentences.chinese: 因意外事件而惩罚孩子是相当粗暴的做法。

sentences.english: To assume the functions and responsibilities of the Foreign Affairs Office of the autonomous region.
sentences.chinese: 承担区委外事工作领导小组办公室的职责。

sentences.english: A man was in a bad accident and was injured.
sentences.chinese: 有一个人遭遇了一场严重的意外事故并受了重伤。

sentences.english: His brother works in the foreign division of the company.
sentences.chinese: 他哥哥在公司的外事部工作。

sentences.english: Hello, this is the Foreign Affairs Police.
sentences.chinese: 您好，这里是台北市警局外事处。

sentences.english: The Monday venue is the Foreign Affairs Hotel of Shenyang Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 周一的口试考场为沈阳师范大学外事宾馆。

sentences.english: He had little recollection of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 那宗意外事故他几乎完全记不起了。

sentences.english: C- lists were published the day after the train accident.
sentences.chinese: 伤亡名单在火车意外事故的第二天就公布了。

sentences.english: He got a few cuts and scratches in the accident.
sentences.chinese: 他在意外事故中被割破和碰伤了几处地方。

sentences.english: Blame only themselves to blame "book, two sages heart read-only window his ears."
sentences.chinese: 怪只怪自己“一心只读圣贤书，两耳不闻窗外事。”

sentences.english: He suffered a serious injury in an accident.
sentences.chinese: 他在意外事件中受到严重伤害。

sentences.english: "Two outside the window, his ears heart read-only sages book" already do not apply.
sentences.chinese: “两耳不闻窗外事，一心只读圣贤书”已不适用。

sentences.english: The risk of severe clinical adverse events was not increased by G-CSF.
sentences.chinese: 给药组的临床意外事件的风险未增加。

sentences.english: Italian chocolate tycoon Pietro Ferrero has died in an accident in South Africa, a company spokesman has said.
sentences.chinese: 意大利巧克力巨头费列罗死于南非的一次意外事故。

sentences.english: My mother’s fear of freak accidents made me fearless.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈对意外事件的担心造就了我的无畏无惧。

definition: national politics/archaic rank, "Minister of State"/common given name
internal affairs/domestic affairs/family affairs/(trad.) affairs within the palace
(political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
personnel/human resources/human affairs/ways of the world/(euphemism) sexuality/the facts of life
